TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStructuralComparable

summary.span: 支持集合对象的结构化比较。

span.span: Supports the structural comparison of collection objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口可以实现自定义的比较的集合成员。The interface enables you to implement customized comparisons for collection members. 也就是说，可以定义精确的含义要位于之前、 之后还是发生在第二个集合对象的相同位置中的排序顺序中的一个集合对象。That is, you can define precisely what it means for one collection object to precede, follow, or occur in the same position in the sort order as a second collection object. 然后可以指定与接受的集合类型使用此定义接口。You can then specify that this definition be used with a collection type that accepts the interface. 此接口具有一个成员， ，用于确定当前集合对象是小于、 等于还是大于第二个对象在排序顺序中。The interface has a single member, , which determines whether the current collection object is less than, equal to, or greater than a second object in the sort order. 由执行实际的成员或当前实例中与第二个对象中的元素的比较接口实现，它包含定义的自定义比较。The actual comparison of the members or elements in the current instance with those in a second object is performed by an interface implementation, which contains the definition of your custom comparison. > [!NOTE] > 接口仅支持结构化比较的排序或顺序。The interface supports only structural comparisons for sorting or ordering. 接口支持自定义比较的结构是否相等。The interface supports custom comparisons for structural equality. .NET Framework 提供了两个默认比较器。The .NET Framework provides two default comparers. 返回一个属性; 其他返回属性。One is returned by the property; the other is returned by the property. 泛型 tuple 类 (， ， ，依次类推) 和类提供的显式实现接口。The generic tuple classes (, , , and so on) and the class provide explicit implementations of the interface. 通过强制转换 （在 C# 中) 或当前实例的数组或元组中的转换 （在 Visual Basic)接口值并提供你实现的自变量作为方法，可以定义的自定义排序顺序数组或集合。By casting (in C#) or converting (in Visual Basic) the current instance of an array or tuple to an interface value and providing your implementation as an argument to the method, you can define a custom sort order for the array or collection. 但是，您不用调用在大多数情况下直接的方法。However, you do not call the method directly in most cases. 相反，排序方法，如调用方法。Instead, the method is called by sorting methods such as . 在这种情况下，定义在实现并将其作为参数传递给排序方法或集合对象的类构造函数。In this case, you define your implementation and pass it as an argument to a sorting method or collection object's class constructor. 然后每当集合进行排序时自动调用带自定义比较器方法。The method with your custom comparer is then called automatically whenever the collection is sorted. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的数组包含三个从 1960 年年到 2000年的美国城市的人口数据的对象。The following example creates an array of objects that contains population data for three U.S. cities from 1960 to 2000. 六元组的第一个组件是城市名称。The sextuple's first component is the city name. 剩余的五个组件表示十年时间间隔的总体 1960 年到 2000年。The remaining five components represent the population at ten-year intervals from 1960 to 2000. `PopulationComparer`类提供了实现，它允许六元及其组件的任何一个进行排序的数组。The `PopulationComparer` class provides an implementation that allows the array of sextuples to be sorted by any one of its components. 两个值提供给`PopulationComparer`其构造函数中的类： 定义排序顺序的组件和一个布尔值，该值指示是否应按升序或降序顺序排序的元组对象的位置。Two values are provided to the `PopulationComparer` class in its constructor: the position of the component that defines the sort order, and a Boolean value that indicates whether the tuple objects should be sorted in ascending or descending order. 该示例然后显示未排序顺序中的数组中的元素、 由第三个组件 （在 1970年填充） 对它们进行排序和显示它们，按第 6 个组件 （2000年中填充） 进行排序并显示它们。The example then displays the elements in the array in unsorted order, sorts them by the third component (the population in 1970) and displays them, and then sorts them by the sixth component (the population in 2000) and displays them. 请注意，该示例不直接调用方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 隐式调用该方法数组中的每个元组对象的方法。The method is called implicitly by the method for each tuple object in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int CompareTo (object other, System.Collections.IComparer comparer);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Public Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer
public: int CompareTo(System::Object ^ other, System::Collections::IComparer ^ comparer);
abstract member CompareTo : obj * System.Collections.IComparer -> int

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 一个将当前集合对象的成员与 other 的对应成员进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object that compares members of the current collection object with the corresponding members of other.

summary.span: 确定当前集合对象在排序顺序中的位置是位于另一个对象之前、之后还是与其位置相同。

span.span: Determines whether the current collection object precedes, occurs in the same position as, or follows another object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个指示当前集合对象与 的关系的整数，如下表所示。

span.span: An integer that indicates the relationship of the current collection object to , as shown in the following table.

item.description: 当前实例位于 之前。
当前实例位于 之后。
The current instance and are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法支持自定义结构化比较和排序的数组和元组对象。The method supports custom structural comparison and sorting of array and tuple objects. 方法调用`comparer`对象的方法来比较各个数组元素或元组组件，从第一个元素或组件开始。The method calls the `comparer` object's method to compare individual array elements or tuple components, starting with the first element or component. 对单个调用结束和方法返回一个值，在下列情况之一，将为 true 时：The individual calls to end and the method returns a value when one of the following conditions becomes true: - 方法返回-1。The method returns -1. - 方法返回 1。The method returns 1. - 方法调用的最后一个元素或组件中的集合对象。The method is called for the last element or component in the collection object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的数组包含三个从 1960 年年到 2000年的美国城市的人口数据的对象。The following example creates an array of objects that contains population data for three U.S. cities from 1960 to 2000. 六元组的第一个组件是城市名称。The sextuple's first component is the city name. 剩余的五个组件表示十年时间间隔的总体 1960 年到 2000年。The remaining five components represent the population at ten-year intervals from 1960 to 2000. `PopulationComparer`类提供了实现，它允许六元及其组件的任何一个进行排序的数组。The `PopulationComparer` class provides an implementation that allows the array of sextuples to be sorted by any one of its components. 两个值提供给`PopulationComparer`其构造函数中的类： 定义排序顺序，该组件的位置和一个值，该值指示是否应按升序或降序顺序排序的元组对象。Two values are provided to the `PopulationComparer` class in its constructor: the position of the component that defines the sort order, and a value that indicates whether the tuple objects should be sorted in ascending or descending order. 该示例然后显示未排序顺序中的数组中的元素、 由第三个组件 （在 1970年填充） 对它们进行排序和显示它们，按第 6 个组件 （2000年中填充） 进行排序并显示它们。The example then displays the elements in the array in unsorted order, sorts them by the third component (the population in 1970) and displays them, and then sorts them by the sixth component (the population in 2000) and displays them. 请注意，该示例不直接调用实现。Note that the example does not directly call the implementation. 隐式调用该方法数组中的每个元组对象的方法。The method is called implicitly by the method for each tuple object in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]
